reviews.review:
One of the best games ever created by a humanity.  The major disadvantage is that you can't play it for the first time again. The story, the humor, voice acting — that is something to consider.
But, fellow player, put aside a keyboard/mouse, joystick or Deck and move yourself outside sometimes, so you don't become as fat as Chell
I love the game, and the voice lines and story are really cool.
This was quite awesome You should play it NOW

s tier game
amazing co-op
cool portal guns

>Buys Portal 2 for my ex.
>We play Coop together.
>GlaDOS calls my ex, fat.
>Ex proceeds to fight.
>GlaDOS saves me from a toxic relationship by being a Yandere AI.
> 10/10 Good Game.

Ótimo jogo, tem um modo historia legal e roda coop. eu recomendo.
vale cada centavos rs
Absolute classic & timeless, one of the greatest games I have ever played.
Story is super exciting and the actual gameplay is fun!

Ну что сказать игра очень хороша, легенда головоломок. Есть немного чёрного юмора.
Оценка
Гемплей 10/10
Графика 9/10 проходил на пс 3 средне на пк очень хорошо на средний,слабый пк
Озвучка 9/10 нормальный но  иногда было не правильно перевидено
Сложность головоломок средне иногда может быть очень сложно 
Полная оценка 10/10 игра никогда не постареет классика головоломок 
                                  Сообщество игры
Сообщество portal 2 это очень весёлые и творческие люди. Которые придумывают отличные дополнения (DLC). Скажу одно ребята весёлые.
this game is so addicting and fun ,its exhilarating and puzzling but it takes patents.
This game is the best puzzle plattformer ever! I love the story and the gameplay so much. Thank you for bringing this game to us gamers.
Even after over 10 years, the game is still fun and interesting and I hope that there will be a sequel to it in the future.
Eins der besten Spiele, die ich je gespielt habe. Einfach legendär

這是一款我唯一能夠控制自己游戲時間的游戲
因爲玩一個小時就在厠所吐了
怎麽做到的啊 能這麽暈
absolute masterpiece of a puzzle game
such a nice game play it yourself but first play portal 1 if you played portal 2 and portal 1 play the first portal 1 horror mod error. have fun :D
即使有了传送门 我也走不进你的心里

Great game
makes me qant to cry when trying to do multiplayer
The first time I played this was at a friend's house on his Xbox when I was like 10. I didn't get it then, but I do now, and it still holds up despite its age.
very nice game, the puzzles is what i love also the history, i recommend! ^w^

I have nothing to say I just wanted to improve the ratings.
Amazing game, I loved the story and the tests were just the right amount of challenging.
Игра просто топ! если у вашего друга есть эта игра советую поиграть вместе.

It was very nice.
smoke weed and play with friend 0 iq but funny
10/10 одна из лучших игр от valve

I really liked this game because the story and just general game design is really good, G.L.a.D.O.S and Wheatley are really funny characters and portal 2 has a kind of humour that is just great, this game has great replayability, custom level design and a cooperative campaign I'm currently playing, I highly recommend Portal 2 and consider it one of my absolute favourite games
If you're on the fence, PLAY IT.
после прохождения игры узнаётся столько всего, всем советую (уитли дурак!)
Очень крутая игра с хорошим сюжетом,графикой,геймплейом и тд. Короче я очень советую

A diferencia del portal 1, la historia de este es mil veces mas larga, mi problema es que en muchas partes se siente mas parkour que puzzles con portales y eso hace que dependas mucho mas de la habilidad que de saber como se pasa el nivel, y hay un par de lugares laberinticos que me parecieron bastante aburridos. Nuevas mecanicas que se agradecen y el workshop 10/10
En cooperativo es uno de los mejores juegos que jugue si bien se siente como si no tuviera historia hay muchos niveles que son realmente dificiles
Отличная игра с крутым сюжетом. Заставляет подумать, хоть решения и простые, иногда приходится долго думать.
if you choose a good teammate for yourself , it can be so fun
